bibl.title: Amphoras on Knidian Amphoras.
bibl.note: Rectangular stamps (bearing the image of an amphora) on the handles of amphoras discovered in 1991 at the site of Marina el-Alamein. - Other devices from Knidian stamp iconography.

bibl.title: Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday.

bibl.seg: Zofia Sztetyłło, Amphoras on Knidian Amphoras.
Henryk Meyza & Iwona Zych (edd.), Classica Orientalia. Essays Presented to Wiktor Andrzej Daszewski on his 75th Birthday (Warsaw, 2011) pp. 441-450, 2 figg.
Rectangular stamps (bearing the image of an amphora) on the handles of amphoras discovered in 1991 at the site of Marina el-Alamein. - Other devices from Knidian stamp iconography.
